## Events

| Event             | Description                                                                                   | Type               |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `ruxmenuselected` | Emits when a rux-menu-item is selected. Emits the rux-menu-item selected in the event detail. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
